properties.entry: SELECT IMG_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, IMG_NAME, IMG_PATH, CATEGORY_NO, SUB_CATEGORY_NAME FROM PRODUCT_IMG PI LEFT JOIN PRODUCT P USING(PRODUCT_NAME) LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_SUB C ON P.CATEGORY_NO = C.SUB_CATEGORY_NO WHERE P.STATUS = 'Y' AND C.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME = ? AND PI.IMG_NAME LIKE '%_1.png%'
